Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje claimed a four-fer as the Proteas beat Sri Lanka by 6 wickets.
Post-Match Reflections: Anrich Nortje was named Player of the Match and said, 'Definitely, this will get some momentum going. Tough few days, we've worked hard and it's nice to get some momentum. Very happy, I've been feeling good from the last few games, finally great to have a good game and get a few wickets.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in New York.
